dmca.title: DMCA notice
dmca.body:
Dear Mr. Ter Avest

I write you on behalf of Glenn Stolfi, the owner of Final Score Trivia.  It has come to my attention that you are the sole registered owner of the domain name and web site www.finalscoretrivia.com.  The content of the stie as it exsists is unacceptable.  As such, you must immediately cease and desist the current iteration of the website, as it is not only inflammatory and defamatory towards Mr. Stolfi, but it also interferes with his business interests.  Such content will not be tolerated, now or in the future.  

If you do not immediately remove all content from www.finalscoretrivia.com, legal action will be immediately forthcoming.  You have (5) business days to respond to this correspondence, before suit will be insitituted in a Court of competent jurisdiction.  

If you have any questions about this matter, please do not hesitate to contact me at the number listed above.  

Sincerely,

-/s/-

Chad G. Spenser, Esquire

cc:
Glenn Stolfi
Joe Mack
